front.title: GMPLS Signaling Procedure For Egress Control

abstract.t: This note clarifies the procedures for the control of the label used on a output/downstream interface of the egress node of a Label Switched Path (LSP). Such control is also known as "Egress Control". Support for Egress Control is implicit in Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Signaling. This note is a clarification to the specification of GMPLS Signaling and does not modify GMPLS signaling mechanisms and procedures.
